<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Send test message to current resource webhook Url"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/webhook/notification/{entity}/ping"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



When you create a new webhook, use this to send a simple ping event to let you know you've set up the webhook correctly

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"entity","description":"Resource Id (entity name)","schema":{"nullable":true,"description":"Resource Id (entity name)","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"204":{"description":"Success NoContent"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
